org.apache.hivemind.parse
Interface InstanceBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
org.apache.hivemind.Locatable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CreateInstanceDescriptor, InvokeFactoryDescriptor
public interface InstanceBuilder
extends org.apache.hivemind.Locatable

Interface for an object that can construct the core implementation for a service.

Author:
Howard Lewis Ship

Method Summary
 org.apache.hivemind.definition.ImplementationConstructor createConstructor(java.lang.String contributingModuleId)
          Returns an instance of ImplementationConstructor that will ultimately create the service implementation instance.
 java.lang.String getServiceModel()
          Returns the name of a service model appropriate for the instance that will be created by the ImplementationConstructor.
